content.heading: Academic Success Coaching
content.description: Academic Success Coaching provides academic support tailored to your needs, so you can reach your fullest potential at Fresno State. We use a holistic approach to coach students in navigating the college experience. In a dedicated one-on-one setting, topics such as motivation, study skills, time management and much more can be explored.

heading.heading: How Do I Get Started?
heading.description: Get connected with one of our certifed Academic Coaches.  Review the quick statements below to take you where you need to go.

items.title: Academic Coaching
items.description: Meet one on one with an Academic Coach.

items.title: Academic Success Workshops
items.description: Learn more about study strategies on your own time.

items.title: Toolkits
items.description: Quick tools on how to better organize and study for classes. (Time Management, note taking, etc.)

items.title: Probation
items.description: Received a letter regarding academic standing? Meet with an Academic Success Coach.

items.title: Student Referral to Academic Success Coaching
items.description: Refer a student to Academic Success Coaching for academic coaching.

items.title: Academic Success Coaching Workshop Request
items.description: Request an Academic Success Coaching workshop for my class and/or organization.
